org.openimaj.web.flickr

Class FlickrImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.web.flickr.FlickrImage

  • public class FlickrImage
extends Object
    A wrapper for Flickr images, and their URLs and what not. This is different to using the Photo class from com.aetrion as it specifically does not require access to Flickr and will not attempt to get any information from Flickr itself (except the image through the getImage() method). It's just a placeholder for any information known about a Flickr image.
    Version:
    $Author$, $Revision$, $Date$
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      • getImage

        public MBFImage getImage()
                  throws IOException
        Reads the actual flickr image. If it's cached then it will read the cache, otherwise it will contact Flickr.
        Returns:
        The image
        Throws:
        IOException
